ecosystem.label: Our Ecosystem
ecosystem.title: A new method of distributing video games
ecosystem.paragraph: Video Game Cartridges on the Blochchain. Decentralized cryptocurrency distribution model moved to video game publishing.

cartridges.label: Cartridges
cartridges.paragraph: Cartridge with a video game on the Blockchain. You must have one piece of the game to play. Freely shape the rules of the secondary market as a Game Creator. Liquidity pools with video games!

game-cap.title: Video Games Market Cap Listing
game-cap.paragraph: Imagine CoinMarketCap with video games that lets you list their prices. Ranking games based on their true value! Nothing shows the quality of a game better than its true price.

game-contract.title: Publish your game by creating GameContract
game-contract.paragraph: Publish games without middlemen with the help of GameContract.io in 5 minutes. Create cartridges on the blockchain in the Smart Contracts factory!

game-wallet.title: Store video games like cryptocurrencies
game-wallet.paragraph: Imagine if gamers were to decide the pricing of games! Buy a game, play a game, borrow a game, sell a game. With us, you will finally own the games!

game-xplorer.title: First blockchain explorer for the gamers
game-xplorer.paragraph: View Player Transactions, their items and NFTs. Take pride in your game collection and collect them. Vote for video games and leave comments under players and profiles! Follow infuencers and friends.

header.description: DeFinitive Edition of Game Publishing Platform. P2P swap with video games between players. Own the game like never before!
header.title: Decentralized Game Publishing Platform
header.ico-signup: Subscribe to IGO of PONG game

airdrop.reserve: Reserve your unique Nickname to receive the Airdrop
airdrop.nick: Your nickname will represent your presence on the HashUp platform
airdrop.connect: Connect to Metamask to copy your reflink

note-1.content: You have an impact on the price of games!

note-2.content: Hash Holders decide which games get released!

note-3.content: Hit up players based on their past purchases!

note-4.content: Explore player libraries, collect games like never before.

partners.label: Together we will change the world
partners.text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

roadmap.header-when: when are we going to do all this

box-2.label: Q4 2021
box-2.bullet-6: Development of green and red cartridge

box-3.label: Q4 2021
box-3.bullet-3: Creation of blue, gold and grey cartridge
box-3.bullet-5: Publication of GameContract, GameCap and GameXplorer
box-3.bullet-6: Listing of the first free market game on GameCap
box-3.bullet-7: Ability to release HTML5 games on HashUp cartridges

box-4.label: Q1 2022
box-4.bullet-2: Building a team to help publish games on Blockchain
box-4.bullet-3: Free and easy airdrops of first games
box-4.bullet-4: Release of HashWallet, enabling release of PC games
box-4.bullet-5: First partnerships with major game and software publishers.

box-5.label: Q2-Q3 2022
box-5.bullet-2: Organisation of the first HashUp event in Poland for Game Developers.
box-5.bullet-5: Start of work on GameXchange and GamePaper
box-5.bullet-6: Publication of HashWallet on Android and IOS
box-5.bullet-7: Opening of FIAT payment gateway -> # and # -> FIAT

box-6.label: Q4 2022
box-6.bullet-2: $1 billion # turnover and cartridges on the platform
box-6.bullet-3: Publication of GameXchange, DEX with AMM and Order Book

szymon-jankowski.description: He believes that technology will enable the rise of crypto-anarchism in the future.

filip-szydlowski.description: Lawyer and cryptocurrency supporter, familiar with working at law firms and startups.

rafal-bielenia.description: He has an extensive background in software and algorithmics, having worked at Google and Microsoft.

marcin-wenus.description: Founder of Comparic.pl, Comparic24.tv and Invest Cuffs Foundation. CEO of Gameparic Studio. Investor.

tomasz-smus.description: Doctor of Law and Economics. He brought Bitcoin to the Polish world.

krzysztof-piech.description: One of the first Bitcoin pioneers in the Polish academic world.

krzysztof-chmielewski.description: Senior lecturer in game research and design at Kazimierz Wielki University. Production manager at Flybridge Studio.

damian-sarnecki.description: A programmer fascinated by the world of blockchain from the technological side.

robert-dziubek.description: Formulates solutions that integrate blockchain technology applications.

jakub-jaworski.description: I've blown so much on crypto that I'm working so I can spend the night in the office.

tomasz-fiema.description: Designer minimalist. Hobbistically interested in gamedev.

szymon-fialkowski.description: For years developing scalable applications on AWS, focused on migration to Web 3.0.

jakub-stebel.description: He is passionate about investing and economic analysis

patryk-rossa.description: Computer science student, passionate about new technologies.

kamil-kaminski.description: A budding 3D generalist with a passion for cryptocurrencies.

pawel-laskarzewski.description: Technology consultant and solution architect with extensive experience in the ICT industry. Synapse Network founder.

wallet-selector.text: Choose how you wish to access your wallet.

cartridges-tab.header: Buy the game. Play. Sell. Cartridge on blockchain. The HashUp Cartridge!
cartridges-tab.header-small-1: We've created entirely new game carriers. On the blockchain. P2P.
cartridges-tab.header-small-2: Your game will finally be yours. You need us because you can't lend your game to a friend.

green.bullet-4: Color: Green as a green candle!

gray.description: The HashUp Cartridge Standart. Own the game.

blue.target: Creators who want to have everything under control.
blue.bullet-3: Price: defined by free market, but Creators can controll exchange fee's.

red.description: No exchange between players. What it is now. Only the Creator can send the game between addresses!
red.target: Creators who are afraid of the free market!
